{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01363v1", "title": "Embedding Higman-Thompson groups of unfolding trees into the Leavitt
  path algebras", "summary": "The isomorphism problem of regular Higman-Thompson groups was solved in
arXiv:1006.1759, via embedding it into the Leavitt algebra. In this paper, we
will expand these results to embed the Higman-Thompson groups of unfolding
trees of directed graphs into the Leavitt path algebra. This embedding allows
us to show that any isomorphism of rooted Leavitt path algebras induces an
isomorphism between Higman-Thompson groups.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA,math.GR", "published": "2025-04-02T05:13:00Z"}
